Reviews.Title: Amazing picture
Reviews.Author: Ayer
Reviews.Content: I got a good deal at my local Best Buy on this 39 inch (38.5 viewable) HDTV, Its really worth the money for the picture quality that Samsung has a reputation for...Pros:1) Great Picture and Sound2) Lots of adjustments for picture and sound3) Picks up local on air channels and the colors are vivid and crisp4) HD looks amazing on this and there are no color bleed as far as I have observed5) LED backlit works perfectly, is lightweight (but not as thin as the other Samsung models)Cons:1) I was about to give this product 4 stars but for the price I got it I gave 5. The greatest cons for this product is no optical or phone jack (in case you need to connect it to external speakers) fortunately there is RCA audio and video out2) Has only 2 HDMI (both works perfectly and is sufficient for my use as of today but in future may not be the case...)Overall a great price for a great product

Reviews.Title: Nice for GAMING!
Reviews.Author: j.b.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV with gaming in mind.  You see, I got the LG 3D 47LW6500 from Amazon in Nov 2011.  Don't get me wrong, it's a great TV for watching TV and movies (3D Blu Ray!), but it suffers from horrendous input lag. Note that response time is not the same as input lag.  Response time refers to the amount of time it takes for a pixel (usually LCD) to change colors (usually from black to white). Input lag is the amount of time from when an input command (pressing a button on your controller) is entered to when it actually takes place or is displayed on the screen, and is a result of a collection of different factors in regards to the image being processed for "clarity". You can still have high response time while suffering from input lag. Sure the pixel can change colors quickly, but what's actually taking place on screen is delayed in time. Much like how live TV is on a delay to give time to edit out bad words in case someone curses.  While gaming, this is a huge deal.  Especially when playing a First Person Shooter, such as Call Of Duty.  Imagine your movements or gunshots being delayed.  Even if it's a small delay, it can make the game very unplayable.  I anticipate buying a WiiU when it comes out, so I decided I would buy a TV that would be good for gaming, and not suffer from input lag.  Almost all of these LCD/LED TVs will "process" the image to enhance it and make it look more clear and crisp.  When watching TV, this is desired, and is no problem if what you see is delayed just a slight bit, because you're not interacting with the content, like you are in a video game.  Another example of this, if you have a computer that can output to a TV (via HDMI) you can see if there is a delay from you moving the mouse, to when that movement of the pointer takes place on screen.  Most of these TVs have a "Game Mode" that is supposed to turn off all of this post image processing.  Sure the image quality and sharpness may suffer a little, but the image being displayed is instantaneous from the moment you press that button on your Xbox controller.  Unfortunately, even WITH its game mode on, my LG 3D TV still suffers from input lag.  I took a chance on this TV, the UN39EH5003, because I am familiar with Samsung's game mode being pretty instantaneous.  And what do you know?  I got it home, hooked up my Xbox, and was able to play a game of COD with all of my movements/shots taking place instantaneously!  I must also note that, though I am pretty sure this TV is only 60hz, the motion while watching cable TV is so smooth.  A good test of this, is a scrolling marquee text that you would see at, for example, the bottom of Fox News channel's feed.  Not at all jagged, and looks fluid.  I was pleasantly surprised to discover this.  Getting the flesh tone of people on screen to look right does require a tad bit of adjustment.  But this TV, for such a low price, is a home run.  39" Is more than enough in my bedroom.  And I have ample room to play WiiU, once it comes out.If you're looking for a TV with gaming in mind, make sure you read up on input lag.  If you have a LED/LCD TV currently, or know someone who does, try and duplicate input lag with a game console, by turning up features like "motion flow", or "LED Dimming" etc.  And turn OFF "Gaming Mode".  Experience it for yourself and prepare to be frustrated.  This TV, when set to "Gaming Mode", does NOT suffer from this problem, and makes a solid rig in which to game on!Also, I hooked up my Samsung Series 7 Gaming Laptop NP700G7C to this TV, and set it to "PC" mode.  With the 17" monitor setting side by side next to this TV, there was absolutely no lag from the movement of my mouse pointer on screen.  This is what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Great deal, awesome picture!
Reviews.Author: Gilda "gilgomez"
Reviews.Content: Got this beauty at my local Costco this week and it was a breeze to set up.  Got it connected to our new Roku and a cheap indoor antenna we had in a closet.  Amazing picture, even the over the air digital signal is great and the channels come in with the cheap old antenna in beautiful crisp HD!Colors are rich, there are plenty of settings and choices to adjust the picture or viewing mode to your liking.  The blacks are black, no light leaks either.A note for those concerned about the sound on this TV:  the sound is awesome.  It is loud, full and clear......streaming Pandora and it is a joy!This TV is terrific for a bedroom, guest room, den and smaller living room/ family room.  It is a terrific size and with such a crisp picture you will enjoy it immensely.I would give it a 5 star but with only two HDMI connections and no ability to self diagnosis or update via internet, a 4 star it is.  But seriously, this is a terrific TV and we are really enjoying it!*I purchased the last one in my local Costco for $439!

Reviews.Title: $349 at Fry's on 17 Aug 2012
Reviews.Author: Neil K. Cadwallader
Reviews.Content: Fry's Electronics had an ad on 17 Aug 2012 that described a 39" LED TV for $349.  It called it a "Famous Brand" rather than identifying it by name.  39" was the perfect size for a bedroom replacement unit we needed.  But we'd never heard of a TV being that size and we were skeptical about its quality since it wasn't named.  We were very surprised that it was a Samsung and were very happy that they had one in stock.  It looks great, has a superior picture and features, a small frame, excellent sound, and is very lightweight.  We couldn't be more pleased at that price.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: Bruce Stewart
Reviews.Content: I am very pleasaed with the TV.  Set up to a Yamaha AV system and Dish Network was very easy.  The only disappointment is the side angle view, it is not as good as what I get with the two Panasonic TV's I currently have.  I would recommend this TV to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Deceptively Advertised
Reviews.Author: abbaida
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV believing it to be a full led backlit 39 inch screen at a good price.  Accepted that the price/feature trade off included that it had just 2 hdmi inputs.  The statements on the box are part of the deception: the box is very clever in what it DOESN'T say. The online spec sheet (at samsung.com) fails to provide actual specs on viewing angle, backlighting or speed.The box says its an led tv.  It doesn't say it is led backlit, and it doesn't say that its led edgelit.  Maybe the box is referring to an led power-on light.  The available claims for this product intentionally lead the consumer to make assumptions, and you can or will be wrong when you do so.Samsung never tells you that it operates at 60Mhz, which several reviewers have noted. Rather, Samsung has invented its own, undefined, way of expressing speed, "Clear view," and calls this the UN39HEH5003 tv "Clear view 120."  This results in a consumer assumption that it runs at 120 Mhz.The box for this TV does not provide a picture of the backpanel, so I didn't find out it doesn't have a CAT5 internet cable input until I had it at home.Samsung witholds any specs on viewing angles.Consumers should be provided accurate specifications in order that they can make a fair comparison in a free marketplace.The online spec sheet (at samsung.com) also fails to provide actual specs.

Reviews.Title: It is really lite
Reviews.Author: M. Colvin
Reviews.Content: And the pics good too. I'm not a genius at TV stuff and really just needed something to replace my TV I lost to my EX... Seriously it's really super lite. Read other reviews for the tech crap. It works and I'm happy!

Reviews.Title: Misleading Specs.. No output port...
Reviews.Author: Ankur Goyal
Reviews.Content: The Specs on the product page says Digital Audio Video Out: 1But there is no output port on the TV. Kinda made a waste for my sound-bar.Will be returning this one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome... I got it yesterday and it looks realy good. the picture quality is also very nice. i think this is the cheapest led tv u can get.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Apple phi
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent.  This TV is smart because it is connected to the Internet wirelessly via our router.  Connection requires your passwords for the Internet, and most apps.

Reviews.Title: NO digital AV out if you get a "Black Friday" model!
Reviews.Author: Nom De Plume "Nom De Plume"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this based on another review that said it had AV output.  Looked everywhere on the TV and couldn't find one. Finally contacted Samsung support and they said "I see that this is a Black Friday model and it does not has an audio out port on it."

Reviews.Title: Satisfied buyer
Reviews.Author: Michael J Rea Jr
Reviews.Content: This TV is all I hoped for and the size fits a cabinet we had.Samsung makes a great TV

Reviews.Title: Great picture Great TV
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: This is an outstanding TV for the price Samsung is a good name great picture easy to use easy set up, PIcture quality is excellent LED makes a difference no glare . LOVE THIS TV

Reviews.Title: katycoyote
Reviews.Author: Katy DeKoter
Reviews.Content: arrived fast. lightweight to carry anywhere. picture is excellent. fits well in the armoir. only challenging part was programing the remote to coordinate with out direct tv satellite system.....if you are smart that isn't even a problem

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN39EH5003 39-Inch 1080p
Reviews.Author: skc
Reviews.Content: -Sound is great. Screen can be very bright But not very crisp or sharp.- The tipping point is the viewing angle, 1 foot off center the screen already start getting cloudy.  I returned it. I can watch My old Olevia TV off to the side and still clear.

Reviews.Title: Not the best bang for your buck, 38.6" and no digital audio output
Reviews.Author: Derick R. Peterson
Reviews.Content: No digital audio output is a glaring limitation for me. I almost foolishly assumed it would have one, as most do given there is no other way to extract high-quality sound from OTA HDTV signals. That's a deal-breaker for me, given my audiophile tendencies, so I decided to pay the extra $30/50/100 for one of Samsung's superior 40-inch 5000/5300(Smart)/6030(3D) models --I went with the latter, in part for its superior 5M:1 contrast ratio. Speaking of which, the fact that Samsung fails to state the contrast ratio for this 38.6-inch HDTV (presumably <=3.5M:1, given only "120 Clear Motion Rating" at 60Hz), whereas they do for others (3.5M:1 for 5000/5300, 5M:1 for 6030, 7M:1 for 6500/6580), is also a red flag on the video side, not to mention the fact that they fail to report viewing angles for most if not all of their TV's (presumably in part so they can randomly substitute inferior LCD panels made by other manufacturers, while the reported specs hold for all such panels, as I've read elsewhere). I see at least one reviewer claims this TV does have RCA analog audio output, something Samsung fails to list in their "detailed" specs, but he hasn't yet responded to others asking where exactly it is.  If there were one, or even a headphone jack, at least that would allow users to hook up some decent speakers if they cared to...  If you want an inexpensive 38-40" HDTV, there are even cheaper options than this 38.6" one from other manufacturers (no one yet makes 39.0", btw, and I believe only 2 companies manufacture the 38.6" panel used here and by others including Coby, Element, Emerson, Haier, RCA, Sceptre, Sharp, TCL, and Vizio); but if you want a higher-quality Samsung you need only fork over the extra $30+ for a 40-inch 5000 model or better, with more connections and features, larger screen, better contrast ratio (and, I believe, viewing angle), etc.  On Thanksgiving, I decided to go with the 6030 model with 3D for just under 500 bucks, but the even cheaper 5300 model Smart TV also looked very tempting and well worth the $50 premium over this "39-inch class" (38.6") Samsung.  Finally, note that both prices and availability will vary this time of year, of course!

Reviews.Title: Good, not fantastic
Reviews.Author: monito
Reviews.Content: Pros:Great image.Great sound for price point. I even decided against buying a sound bar!Great features.Cons:No audio output at all. Please note that the description lies!Has upward tilt on stand. Not sure why that's the case, but it's mildly annoying when walking past it. Not really noticeable when sitting down and watching the TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: L. Carroll
Reviews.Content: After spending countless hours of research on televisions, I really liked the Samsung 32 inch LED TV.  However, once the price on the 39 inch fell below $400, I decided to take a chance on the 39 inch as it was only $150 more than the 32 inch for an upgrade in size and resolution.  Overall, I am very impressed with Samsung televisions.  They make a great TV and you can spend around $200 for a knock-off television of the same size that will end up breaking down in less than 3 years or you can invest in a Samsung and have your television for 10 years without any problems.The features on the television are incredibly user friendly and set-up was a breeze.The Samsung advertises a 120 clear motion rate, but in reality, it is 60Mhz.  I have found that this speed has not affected the picture in the least bit.I do not have cable and the automatic tuner picked up all the surrounding stations with a cheap antenna.  I live about 10 miles from downtown in a mid-sized city.  I have also hooked up my computer to the TV via an HDMI cable and could not be happier with the picture and resolution.  I spent $1.60 total on an HDMI cable from Amazon and it works great.If you are looking for a high quality television, this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Suits my needs
Reviews.Author: Faith B. "Faith"
Reviews.Content: Very good picture quality for the price.  I don't know much about HD TVs but this one is perfect for me.  I couldn't have asked for more.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV!!
Reviews.Author: kimmarc723
Reviews.Content: Very good tv!!! Great picture and looks smaller than it actually is. Can watch movies off a USB drive with no issues and can listen to music off usb drive too. My only issues were small thing - 1. No input for earphones 2. No network port.  Not deal killers for me but still a great TV for the price!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I Like Samsung
Reviews.Author: Rita
Reviews.Content: I had previously purchased this product from sears on black Friday 2009.  This is a quality product, larger and is in my family room.  I purchased this one for my bedroom.  It works great!!

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Bennett Giesler
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great value to cost ratio. Between this and a 40" this is a no brainer in terms of what you get for the money. There is such a cost difference between 39 and 40 and for one inch you really wont even notice the difference.

Reviews.Title: Great tv at a fantastic price!
Reviews.Author: Dianne C Perkins
Reviews.Content: Incredible price on this 39" flat screen.  The screen clarity is excellent and the tv is very lightweight.  I would recommend it to my family and friends.  I definitely was a bargain!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a GREAT Price
Reviews.Author: Megan M.
Reviews.Content: This TV is one of the best in its' class, and Amazon was offering it for an amazingly low price. I'm so glad I chose to buy here instead of a big box store. It shipped and arrived on time, in perfect condition. I had no trouble at all with setup. Picture is great, sound isn't the best, but that's what speaker systems are for!

Reviews.Title: WOW factor
Reviews.Author: BassGuitar
Reviews.Content: What a great find.  Way cheaper than the big boxes and what a value.We're really pleased with sound and picture too.LED is THE way to go.  Everything else is old tech.I only wish I could use close caption in HDMI.  I have tried to get it in regular mode but the instructions are foggy at best.  Maybe I'm missing something???

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: peeps261
Reviews.Content: I was about yo buy this at pc richards looked on amazon better price it works great picture is wonderful I love love it must get a bigger one

Reviews.Title: Well worth it
Reviews.Author: tiger77 "tiger77"
Reviews.Content: This TV is well worth what I paid.  Picture quality is great.....controls easy to use....set up was super easy even for this tech-challenged grandma.  Wish it had wi-fi......but that's my only negative.  And it's not a biggie.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture, decent sound, low price
Reviews.Author: Rodney J. O'Malley
Reviews.Content: This system was exactly as described both by the marketing folks and by the comments.  It has a clear, sharp picture and decent sound.  It serves its purpose well with no bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Coby
Reviews.Content: Great picture very clear and crisp color and very easy to set up. Used CNET  reccomendations for setup and just great ..as for sound it is just fine for an average viewer like me no complaints and got o sale for $398 so fantastic prices ..love my amazon had got Vizio first but after reading all the negative reviews returned it and got this one and amazon customer service was fantastic ...Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: Samsung 39"HDTV
Reviews.Author: Luvenia Moretz
Reviews.Content: It was fine didn't have as many connections as I would have liked or settings The picture on this set is very clear and so is the volume.

Reviews.Title: 39" TV
Reviews.Author: aukola
Reviews.Content: I really do like new TV. Had a Samsung I bought 6 yrs. ago and the capacitor wore out. I was upset that Samsung wouldn't at least give me a credit so I could buy new one.  Loved that TV..  and bought another one, even though I thought at first I would try another brand. Looked at some that were cheaper or appeared to be a better deal. Finally decided on buying another Samsung...do like their products and was leery about some of these new brands on market. I was especially happy that I could buy one on Amazon and I wouldn't have to handle it. It's not easy for someone my age to wrestle a box that size, getting it in the car and then into the house. I chose One Day Shipping and that is amazing...I ordered about 10 PM one evening and it was here about 2 PM next afternoon. Great Service - I will buy items that I need in the future from Amazon.  Can be trusted and are very prompt on delivery. Good decision..!!

Reviews.Title: EH5003 Blas-Tech BARGAIN
Reviews.Author: Zac Smith "HanSabaacSolo"
Reviews.Content: The Sammy EH5003 39' LED is quite a steal! I also own a Sammy 46' Series 8 LED, which is am amazing tube, and this little EH5003 can hold its own with gaming and Blu-Rays. I highly recommend this for the $3-600 price range in mind. I tested it out with Bioshock Infinite, and it looked absolutely superb!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for our master bedroom, and it has been excellent.  It's the first LED TV we've owned.  Picture quality is excellent, and the sound from the speakers is very good - easy to understand, full and rich.Maybe it is common with LED TVs, but the only gripe I have about the TV is that you need to be looking at the screen directly in order to get the best picture.  That is, if you are looking at an angle, you won't see the deep colors.Bottom line, I like this TV and wouldn't hesitate to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Edana Merchan
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure to buy a used  TV, but it was really as new, the original box and another covering it help so the TV was not damaged. There wasn't any problem, I just plug and play and it worked perfectly. And of course the price was great.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for the price.
Reviews.Author: Pander
Reviews.Content: Looks great, operates great, priced great. I really can't think of anything negative to say, other than I wish it had an optical-out option for sound and a VGA/DVI input.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN39EH5003 39-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED
Reviews.Author: Jaylow
Reviews.Content: I am happily suprized by this TV. Despite the 39" screen being a bit of an awkward size, it has great clarity and good sound. Find it for the right price and your good.

Reviews.Title: Can't complain.
Reviews.Author: Mr.green
Reviews.Content: Its was a great deal. The television has great aesthetics and great feel to it. Almost has not weight for a TV this big. Fantastic present.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: scooter
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough of how happy I am to have purchased this item before the new tax reform started.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: deborah a neale
Reviews.Content: Love this TV. We have even used this TV outside , picture is clear, great colors!We have another,older Samsung 50 inch tv. Have had good luck With the brand.

Reviews.Title: bare bones TV
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Bought a 39 inch and not a 40 to fit a specific wall unit in out basement.  Decent picture.  No bells or whistles at this price.  My only negative is that it has no audio out connection.  Not a problem for the most part as other compenents can be hooked through a receiver via HDMI and you can always add a swtich if necessary.  The only reason I need an audio out from the TV is I have it hooked up to an OTA antenna and can't send the audio signal out from broadcast TV to my receiver.  Otherwise generally pretty happy with it.Greg

Reviews.Title: Performs well
Reviews.Author: FD Firefighter 121 "Remember the 343"
Reviews.Content: I have this wall mounted in my son's room. I have several various sized Samsung TV's and I like the clarity of the picture

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: TvGeek
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for about a year now and have had no problems with it. Samsung is the best brand to go with for anything because of the quality of their products. For an LCD, i would give the video quality a 9 and the audio an 8. Plug in a blu-ray player and i would give the video quality a 20 out of 10! It's and awesome tv and would suggest it for anyone. The one thing i would change on it would be the touch screen buttons on the tv. If they could light up it would be a lot more helpful because it's dark grey buttons on a black surface. Hard to see. Other than that, it's an awesome tv.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: hasky
Reviews.Content: So far works good. No issue. Purchased during christmas special.  Good color. Love the Menu button under the TV. Good Value.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Evan K
Reviews.Content: Picture is amazing and for 300$ on the Black Friday deals it couldn't be beat. I definitely recommend this purchase.

Reviews.Title: i give it 3 star~~~
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: the picture is really good since it is sansung tv,  but  the sound i have to say it is not good................

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: fd1
Reviews.Content: It is a samsung so what do you expect.  It is a good tv.  Not my first samsung and will not be my last.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: GaryF
Reviews.Content: This set may not have all the bells and whistles, but is perfect for my needs.  The very thin frame allowed me to place into an existing cabinet that previously only fit a 32" TV.  I didn't need "smart" TV access, PC connectivity.  And, I use digital sound direct from my DVR so lack of it on the TV was not a problem.  Great picture.

Reviews.Title: Crisp
Reviews.Author: hezron
Reviews.Content: This TV is nothing short of quality on sound and image.It has tonnes of features to modify the display and even modes such as gaming mode, and standard and dynamic image quality. Surround sound effects are fantastic and it has enough HDMI and usb ports to fit all my needs.I love it.. and the only thing id change it for.. is a Bigger one if i find tha money :)

Reviews.Title: Very happy with our purchase!
Reviews.Author: Shawna
Reviews.Content: Packaging was good.  Easy set up.  My only complaint was that it did NOT come with a HGTV cord so that we could hook up our Dish.  Had to run out late in the evening in order to get fully set up.  Keep that in mind.  That way you can purchase what you need ahead of time or online with the t.v. so you can have everything in arms reach for set up.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 39-Inch 1080p LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Arif Rahman "OSU Student"
Reviews.Content: So far I like the picture quality and the ability to use external usb drive to watch movies. It would have been great if it had one more usb port. I would definitely recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with Very Good Sound
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I'm completely satisfied with my purchase. Samsung proves once again to be highly reliable. The picture is crystal clear and the sound is far from disappointing, I never turn it higher than 25 (the tv sits in a large bedroom). What a huge improvement in picture quality when compared with the other three Lcd Tvs I have (Insignia, Toshiba, Westinghouse).

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE LED TV
Reviews.Author: Barbara Pleczynski
Reviews.Content: PERFECT SIZE FOR ALL ROOMS. PRESENT FOR MY SON FOR CHRISTMAS. HE LOVES IT AND THE PRICE WAS JUST RIGHT.

Reviews.Title: Like it.
Reviews.Author: David Belfry
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, good quality, and it arrived on time and worked out of the box.  Good product, good picture, good value.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Jason Handley
Reviews.Content: It is a great tv but it needs more components for AUX plugs. other then that the tv is a great size and looks great

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a reasonable price with no lines after Black Friday
Reviews.Author: GLVR
Reviews.Content: This TV met all of my expectations. I was originally looking at off brand TV's like GE, Westinghouse, etc. The reviews of these were almost always mixed with dead pixels, etc. The Samsung brand is almost universally recognized along with Sony as the best. This TV didn't even cost $100 more than those and it is LED too. Free shipping and no tax from Amazon sold it. The black levels look great to me and the quality when hooked up to HD input seems awesome to me. I am no expert, but it seems like a great TV to me. The only thing I wished all of these newer TV's had was another RCA type input on the front for games, etc. It is a bear to get to the back inputs, but they are already full already anyway with a VCR or DVD. I have a dual deck VCR/DVD and wanted to use the component out on the DVD for better quality, but the VCR side had to use composite. I bought a component to HDMI converter also on Amazon and used that for the DVD and the RCA jacks for the VCR. Now, though I only have one HDMI input left for future use.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv  for games -
Reviews.Author: Carlos  Salinas
Reviews.Content: primary use - video games  -good color , sound is a little soft , but that was to be expected - setup took like 3 minutes , same familiar Samsung menus -

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality with clear audio
Reviews.Author: Aditya
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd LED TV purchase. I did not intend to connect this TV with a sound system or gaming console, so even only with 2 HDMI ports available, I am perfectly fine. The picture quality is great (in terms of color rendering, brightness and sharpness), and you can play with a lot of settings to adjust to your own satisfaction. The internal speakers are loud, more than enough to occupy a small bedroom. Just make sure you have HD input on this TV (cable, sat) to fully exploit its capability. I bought this from Amazon last Thanksgiving for $397.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I thought
Reviews.Author: Michael Brogan "mpb"
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung, and this is not as bright or clear as the one I already have. It is good, not great.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in November and I am in love with the image quality!. I knew I would be upgrading my sound system to help the sound coming from the TV. I have it connected from my sub to the cable box via optical cable. The sound is very good and the image superb. The quality of the football games comes out extremely beautiful. There's only 2 hdmi behind the tv but for me its more than fine. One for the cable box and the other to my ps3.

Reviews.Title: very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Harold Oldinski
Reviews.Content: Replaced an old analog TV in our bedroom (19inch).  Larger wide screen much better viewing and can read closedcaptioning.  Very good picture.  Have mounted it on wall which saves room in small bedroom.  Very pleased withpurchase.  Good quality at a very good price.  Sound quality could be better, but is acceptable as we use to view TV programs only.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Samsung continues to be the TV brand to beat
Reviews.Author: Red Raider 97
Reviews.Content: This is our third Samsung TV, and each one has delivered the best value for the price out there.  This has a great picture, easy setup, and good sound (this one is not hooked up to any home entertainment center--it's a standalone).  I will continue to buy Samsung TVs.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Frederick G. Plummer "fredp"
Reviews.Content: I will buy another when the time comes. It has a very good picture quality, with an easy setup.  I will recommend  this product.

Reviews.Title: It does well what it is supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: E. J. Otremba
Reviews.Content: It was the right size and choice for a basement rec room.  The sales price was enough to make it competitive with some cheaper lessor known brands.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: William R. Klein
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung TV which I purchased and both of them have great picture quality.  I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: zido
Reviews.Content: I already have a larger flat screen in my media room and selected this smaller one for my fireplace living room in the winter and my screened porch in the summer.  I wanted one that would be good for bright light and also be light enough to easily carry from its winter location to its summer location.  It has been perfect!!!  Very light weight, very good picture even in bright light, very good optional sound adjustments, and  simple set up.  I also enjoyed the home delivery verses having to manage getting it in and out of my car.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Got this TV because it was relatively inexpensive, I wasn't interested in 3D or SmartTV, and it was the biggest screen I could get that would fit in the 36" wide opening in my cabinet.  The unusual 39" size and the thin bezel made it possible.  Overall, I'm pleased with it -- it has a very good picture when viewing it straight on, although the brightness falls off fast when viewing at more than about a 30 degrees off-axis.  It would be nice if it had more than 2 hdmi inputs -- I actually miscounted what I would need when ordering as I have a set top box, dvd and an apple tv.  So I ended up using the component inputs for the set top box (I don't really see too much difference).  I figured that by not getting one of the more expensive sets now, I could justify replacing it in a few years if something great comes along.Amazon delivery was impressive.  I had it sent by standard (free) delivery, and it got here in only about 2 or 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Works great for a basic HD TV
Reviews.Author: sgearlybird
Reviews.Content: I bought this for use in my bedroom to replace a CRT.  It was the largest screen I could get that would fit in the armoir.  The picture is a good quality for a 60 hz HD and the sound is good but not great.  I recommend it for a large basic HD TV for someone who can do without all the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Paul J. Grimyser "MrGrim323"
Reviews.Content: This is a great size TV for someone looking for a easily visible picture, but who does not want a huge TV in their room.  I purchased this for my Dad and he is very happy.  He sits across the room in his easy chair and can still see the TV.  Sounds is great and I am happy with the quality... Samsung is a great brand!

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a basic TV for the bedroom without Bleeding my bank account dry. After tons of research I knew this was the one for me and my budget, I saw this at my local 'Best Buy' on sale for $399.99. Installation was easy, It only 2 HDMI ports which is GOOD cause I only have it setup to my Blu-Ray player and Directv reciever. no tweaks or additonal speakers required. For such a "Basic TV"  I really got my money's worth. I STRONGLY recommened using 'Cinem Mode' it's the BEST viewing experience for this Television, OVERALL: I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very good monitor
Reviews.Author: PhotoHiker "Ken"
Reviews.Content: I acquired this monitor to use on my home office for use with my laptop.  The lapt screen is much to small for multiple windows and graphics.  This monitor is very nice for the price and is very easy to set up.  I am very happy with it and have had no problems, after using it for a couple of months.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: JPage
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality, sleek design this is a perfect midsize TV for a dorm, office, or bedroom. For the price this is a great TV..

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price.
Reviews.Author: B. Brown
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to setup. Used settings from another users review. Sound could be better, but all in all a good value.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 39"  LED
Reviews.Author: D. Elliott
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with my choice of this Samsung LED. Crystal clear, easy to set-up and it fit the space perfectly. The picture and ease and ease of operation is excellent. I feel proud of myself for choosing this TV and equally proud that I went through Walmart. The price was excellent and the delivery spot on as anticipated. Thank you Walmart.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN39EH5003 39-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: AG
Reviews.Content: I was trying to find a tv that would fit in an old entertainment unit.  This tv is a perfect fit and has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my corner cabinet
Reviews.Author: Kristine Sullivan "Irishvb04"
Reviews.Content: I was limited to the size of TV I could put into my cabinet, and this was the biggest one I could fit.  Picture is good, not great!  We have a 50" Panasonic 3D that is much better, but we knew that when we ordered this.  Sound is ok as well, but that might depend on the set up we have.  It fits our needs perfectly, since this TV is more for the kids and not our Main, high quality TV.

Reviews.Title: Good HDTV
Reviews.Author: John A Regnier
Reviews.Content: Good picture, good sound, some minor problems with channel setup- sometimes "forgets" one of the favorites and stored channels- requires some manipulating to recover the channel.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: fish2fry
Reviews.Content: For under $400 thsi TV cant be beat.  Hooked up with an HDMI cable the picture is as good as my friends tv who paid over $1000.  Highly recomended.

Reviews.Title: Excelent !!!
Reviews.Author: Xyz Jaeger "XYZ"
Reviews.Content: Excelent review for this product... I recive en perfect conditions and really fast. I like de image quality and the size is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice LED TV
Reviews.Author: Sarah Diane
Reviews.Content: My son purchased this TV for his room.  He is extremely happy with the picture quality and sound.  He uses it primarily for video games, dvds and streaming video from You Tube and Netflix.  The picture is crisp and clear and the sound ranks among the best I've heard from a tv in this price range.  I have a slightly smaller version and we would both recommend Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: charles stanley
Reviews.Content: Needed a TV to replace an old tube TV for my mom.  Consumer Report rated the Samsung 32 inch line of TVs very well (UN32 EH4000 and UN32EH5000) so I took a shot with this 39 inch model.  For a 39 inch TV, it had the thinnest bezel which allowed this TV to fit where some 37 inch models would not.TV was unpacked and operational in less than 30 mins.  With built in tuner, was able to pick up HD channels right off the cable box (coax) and picture was incredible.  Saw some reviews where people complained about the sound but with a few adjustments off the menu option, I found the sound to be more than adequate.  Could not go above about 25 before it became too loud and was only half-way - so plenty of headroom on the sound level left.Since I only have TV hooked up via coax, I can't speak for the HDMI connections but having 3 other flat screens (2 plasma and one LCD) that all run off HDMI, I would expect the picture to be even better if it was connected via HDMI.For $400, you cannot beat this TV if you are looking for something for a bedroom or would probably make a great monitor.  Ordered from Amazon and was delivered in 3 days!!!  Amazing.Pros:  biggest picture for the width, color/picture, easy installation, very light, easy to use menu/remoteCons:  USB port in the back seems ridiculous - not sure what you'd do with that, only 2 HDMI inputs a problem if you have alot of AV equipmentSince others have had problems after having set for awhile, I will report back if I run into any issues.

Reviews.Title: horrible sound
Reviews.Author: guitar player MD "Guitar Player"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv after my sony which I loved was replaced. I got this one on sale for only $399. Great deal- wrong. I unpacked the tv and tossed out the box. I have 4 other samsungs and love them.  I listened to the tv and tried to adjust the sound so many different ways and the best is just bad. So  I bought a sound bar for another $200 and could not hook it up since it has no audio out. I called samsung and basically they tried everything, but the bottom line is the picture quality is fair and that is all. The sound is horrible. I cannot return the tv since I tossed out the box. I guess I got stuck with this tv. I will eventually throw it out and take the loss, but not yet since it is brand new and feel bad I cannot return it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price, just a couple nitpicky idiosyncrasies
Reviews.Author: dmaitre
Reviews.Content: For the price I got this TV for, it's absolutely amazing! Very clear picture, and colors are great. It's true as other reviews say that it's the refresh rate is 60 and not truly 120, and it's not full-array LED, but I wouldn't expect anything different for the price.Just a few important things you may want to know...- When the TV is off there is a small red light, I guess to tell you it's plugged in. This might be annoying if it's in a bed room or something.- There ARE speakers--the other review was wrong--and they are quite decent, but you should know there is NO audio out.- Kind of weird, but the TV angles back slightly... Not sure why they designed it that way. It doesn't move from this position, either, but it's not really a problem at eye-level.These don't bother me for my specific set up. If this is all good for you, too, it's a great TV, and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: Guy Hulsey
Reviews.Content: Just as expected. Set up easy. Clear picture, Good sound. Would buy again. Nice Unit. aa aa aa aa aa

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: ok_reviewer
Reviews.Content: This is a nice Samsung LED TV or under $400.  The TV has good picture quality, decent sound quality (for a flatscreen), looks very classy, and has a nice amount of features for the price.  When purchasing don't expect it to be a top of the line, $1000+ TV, it's not.  It is a good basic TV that will provide you decent picture on a budget.  Know that the TV is only 60Hz so you might see some blurring during fast moving scenes, football games, basketball games, video games, etc.  That will happen with any 60Hz TV because the refresh rate is slow enough to be visible to the human eye.Overall a good budget TV, that is light enough to easily mount on the wall in most spaces.

Reviews.Title: Good Gaming TV
Reviews.Author: Michael H
Reviews.Content: Very excellent picture quality. I use this for gaming and movies. Does just fine. Needed a very little tuning on the brightness and color tone. Gaming mode allows it to keep up with FPS games online.

Reviews.Title: Great 39" LED TV for the price
Reviews.Author: rrgmitchell
Reviews.Content: My husband and I purchased this TV during the Thanksgiving holiday weekend.  We were looking for a TV that would fit in our entertainment center.  We happened upon the Samsung 39" for $397.99 which was a great price for that size and a near perfect fit for our entertainment center.  This TV has a nice picture, ( I stress the word nice and not great).  The sound quality was much better than expected and the TV was very easy to set up.  After having owned a Samsung 32" LED TV in the past, we did not hesitate to purchase this one.  I will say that this Samsung does not come with all the bells and whistles that a lot of the other TV's have. It only has 2 HDMI ports on the back and no Computer connection. This doesn't bother us, we purchased this TV to watch as a TV and not a computer monitor.  All in all it's a great TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: soundandtaste
Reviews.Content: I got this TV on Black Friday when it finally came, everything was good until after an hour, the sound was not working anymore. I got a defective one such a hassle.

Reviews.Title: Very nice. Updated. Cannot hook up headphones/speakers!
Reviews.Author: J.P,
Reviews.Content: I chose and ordered this for my grandparents. My husband set it up at our house first to make sure everything worked right with no defects, etc. When I came into the living room he was playing Black Ops II, lol. For being a 60hz (which he normally rolls his eyes at) it impressed him. This TV has a great picture! I wish I had ordered 2 on Black Friday. We would have loved one upstairs. As for sound, we changed it from standard immediately and it was decent. The audio feature for hard of hearing and voice/background noise will come in handy for the grandparents.Update: The audio feature wasn't enough for my grandfather. During the night he has a headset so that he will not wake others up. Well.. there is no place to plug it in! I had to go up there first, then call Samsung about it thinking there must be a mistake on our part or we need a different headset (although this one is new). Nope. Why would they sell a TV for this price that cannot be hooked up to speakers/surround systems or headsets?? Even most super cheap led/lcd televisions have that capability! If it wasn't past my 30 days I would certainly return and purchase a different television for them. They love the crisp clear picture, but what good is a tv if they cannot hear it?

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: Overall it's a ok basic tv. It looks and feels cheaply made. It is not worth the money paid. Getting a good picture took some work and navigating the menu could be easier. NO optical audio, which is on every other Samsung except the bottom line 403,4003 32 inch models.I feel deceived by the 120hz clear motion rate when the TV is clearly a 60 hzI would NOT recommend this overpriced tv.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: mintberry crunch
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a crappy 24 inch square TV I had in my room that I used to mainly play my xbox. After using my brother's 46 inch samsung plasma I realized I needed something better because I had never seen games so crisp on a TV before. Needless to say I bought this because it was the perfect size for my room and it looks great. The picture is sharp and crisp and the size is perfect. It also helps that I didn't have to pay tax or shipping or get run over by people at Walmart who had the same TV on sale. I ordered it on sunday on got it on wednesday. This is why I love Amazon lol.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value - Great TV
Reviews.Author: Rafwheat
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung UN39EH5003 LED HDTV from Amazon.com for $398.00 with free shipping. We needed a TV that was no wider than 36 inches to fit our cabinet, so all the 40 inch TVs were too large. It arrived one day after my order.  Assembly was pretty standard, requiring screwing the base to the TV (8 phillips head screws).  I am using this TV in our Master Bedroom with a Standard Definition DirecTV box.  The picture is a noticiable improvement over the 2006 vintage, 32" Samsung LCD HDTV it replaced (that TV is going to the Hobby Cave).The TV was easy to setup and it appears as if it is upscaling the SD signal. Someday we will upgrade our DirecTV boxes & dish to HD, yet for now we are very pleased with the picture quality. It is not 1080 quality, yet very crisp & clear.  The sound quality is fine and inline with other flat panel TVs.I feel this TV as plenty of input/output options, especially if you use a cable or satilite box, as the TV becomes a simple monitor display, and the sound outputs are on the settop box.My Bottom Line on the Samsung UN39EH5003 HDTV is that it is a excellent value, sub $400, name brand LED TV with just the right amount of options.  It does excatly what its specifications say, and it does it very well.  I am pleased with this TV, and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: New H DTV
Reviews.Author: John R. Myers
Reviews.Content: My husband really likes the clearity of his new TV.  Fit our entertainment unit like it was made for it. Didn't particularly like the added features to our Cox cable bill $. :- )

Reviews.Title: exelent product and exelent shippeng
Reviews.Author: lester
Reviews.Content: exelent product and exelent shippeng good very good buys  exelent product and exelent shippeng good very good buys exelent product and exelent shippeng good very good buys

Reviews.Title: Crystal Clear
Reviews.Author: Peggie666
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen TV -- replacing a ginormous 1980's Toshiba ... Obviously I wasn't too concerned with picture quality and don't watch all that much television. But when I could see the hockey puck without my glasses on, I realized exactly what I was missing! Awesome TV with awesome sound, too.

Reviews.Title: Great Television!
Reviews.Author: Jace
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my parents - their first HDTV.  My dad loves it - huge sports fan.  For the picture quality, it is great.  This is exactly what I and they expected.  It is very clear, sharp and bright.  The refresh rate is only 60Hz, but using the 120 Motion Rate, it looks a bit better, but I wouldn't say 120Hz.  I bought this model particularly because I heard such good things about the sound - my mother has bad hearing.  When we hooked this TV up, she was pissed.  The sound was terrible - no bass or depth.  I remember she described it as a "tin can".  After playing w/ the settings for awhile, we got it figured out.  For the size of the unit, the bass is perfect.  The volume also goes very, very high.  My mother has more than enough power to hear the thing in the next room or a couple over.  A+ purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 39" LED
Reviews.Author: Steven J. Arsenault
Reviews.Content: arrived on schedule. Was very easy to set up.  Samsung as always comes through with an excellent product.  Final price of $397.99 was excellent.  Put the item on my wish list and within a week the priced dropped $50.00.

Reviews.Title: black and white strips
Reviews.Author: steelpulse
Reviews.Content: Love Samsung but not this one... Ours was defective...sent it right back for black and white lines on the screen...was a great size, great sound, picture would have been good too without the lines...with all that said, I think it was just a lemon but I am going to get a different model just in case....Samsung is usually top notch and Amazon took it right back with a full refund....was able to track it back...I give it 3 stars for the easy return...THANKS AMAZON!!! Love your customer service and normally fantastic deals ;) I am looking for another Samsung or Toshiba deal from Amazon....

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: hman
Reviews.Content: great LED TV, only downfall is that you only have 2 hmdi ports and 1 component port. I have an xbox 360, ps3 and PC that all are hdmi compatible I ended up using the component for my xbox 360 which lowered its graphics by a substantial amount.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that I can plug in a usb card on the back to watch some shows I have from my computer.Great buy.

Reviews.Title: ** Super Great TV And Cool Features**
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: This tv is amazing I just got it.. One thing to add is that aa HDMI cable is a must here if you are plugging more than one device into the tv.

Reviews.Title: audio
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: limited hookup for audio equip.Picture is good but cant hookup other audio equipment!!Samsuung fails to tell you this.So now i have to return..

Reviews.Title: Samsung 39"  HDTV 120Hz
Reviews.Author: James Snodgrass
Reviews.Content: Rated this TV 4 stars because of limited input jacks (1 HDMI) plus others and average sound quality.  Otherwise the rating would be 5 stars. Great picture.  Light weight so easy to install on existing wall mount.  Used an HDMI multi input switch to solve the single HDMI input jack problem. This TV is installed in the master bedroom.  Also attached a ROKU box to the HDMI multi input switch.  DirecTV box & ROKU box work fine with the HDMI multi input switch.  (rocketfish 4 HDMI input switch)  Please note that the model I purchased is a 120Hz model, not a 60Hz model as stated by Amazon. (Samsung product # UN39EH5003F)

Reviews.Title: samsung  led tv
Reviews.Author: Deliliah J. Whitehead
Reviews.Content: I put a lot of homework into what exactly what I required in a new tv set,this one truly fits the bill if you're requirements are that you need a tv for viewing purposes.Super easy to set up,beautiful picture and very good sound.The one feature that I admired the most was in the tools you could set the sound to standard,amplify,movie,music, or clear voice. How many times have you been unable to hear the voice because of background sounds?The last part of my review is amazon itself.There was a little bit of confusion as to weather or not my tv had been delivered .Thank you amazon service reps. for your time job well done.

Reviews.Title: Good tv.
Reviews.Author: jorvan12
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. The lighting is great, the colors show really nice. This is the best TV that I have ever owned. I was very disappointed to find out that is has no place for audio out. I had a tower I was going to hook up to it, but now I can't because there is not place to plug it in.

Reviews.Title: great buy for tv
Reviews.Author: lb5154
Reviews.Content: THE SAMSUNG THAT I PURCHASED FIT THE EXACT SPACE I WAS LOOKING FOR TO MAXIMIZE THE SCREEN AREA.  SOME I HEAR COMPLAINED ABOUT THE SOUND BUT I FIND IT ADEQUATE. THE PICTURE IS GREAT IT WAS SO GOOD I BOUGHT ONE FOR MY KITCHEN

Reviews.Title: Sure it would have been nice
Reviews.Author: Steven M Kradas
Reviews.Content: TV arrived, box looked fine. Opened the box and the screen was smashed. Black Friday special, no more left at this price. Return was easy but no TV, the danger of ordering from Amazon I guess.

Reviews.Title: Broken TV
Reviews.Author: Raymond P. Kawolics Jr.
Reviews.Content: The TV was not shipped in an over shipper box for extra protection.  We we set up the TV on Christmas day, turned it on and found the screen was broken internally.  Black and white colors bled all across the screen.  It looked like the package was dropped during shipping.

Reviews.Title: Es muy ancho
Reviews.Author: perky888
Reviews.Content: Es muy anchoEl TV es muy ancho no es slim, pensé que era súper delgado, me muy puse triste

Reviews.Title: bad quality
Reviews.Author: Lucia Oliveira
Reviews.Content: I was waitig for more quality on the image and also I was waitig for a smart TV. I returned it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD 1080p
Clear Motion Rate 120
Wide Color Enhancement
Connect Share Movie
TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 35.3-Inch x 23.2-Inch x 9-Inch, TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 35.3-Inch x 21-Inch x 3.7-Inch
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN39EH5003 39-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) (2012 Model)
